title: Matchups to Watch in the Championship Games
description:
Nora and Mal start by mentioning the most recent coaching and general manager hires around the league (1:01). Then they identify a couple of key matchups to watch in the AFC (7:35) and NFC championship games (26:46).

Hosts: Nora Princiotti and Mallory Rubin
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely 
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
